title: GET_ENTITY_REMOTE_SYNCED_SCENES_ALLOWED
content:
0x91B38FB6// GetEntityRemoteSyncedScenesAllowed
BOOL GET_ENTITY_REMOTE_SYNCED_SCENES_ALLOWED(Entity entity);Parameters:entity: The entity to get the flag for.Returns: Returns if the entity is allowed to participate in network-synchronized scenes initiated by clients that do not own the entity.
codeBlocks:
local entity = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_ENTITY_REMOTE_SYNCED_SCENES_ALLOWED
GetEntityRemoteSyncedScenesAllowed(entity)
